feature-1.title: Crop Disease Detection
feature-1.description: You can detect diseases of your crop at early stage and can reduce the chances of facing big losses. Take Good decisions and earn more .

feature-2.title: Daily Irrigation Reminders
feature-2.description: Daily irrigation reminders ensuring that crop receives adequate amount of water . This reduces risk of over or under watering .

feature-3.title: Market Insights
feature-3.description: Insights into trends and demands of the market . This will help you decide what crop to grow and when to sell them for maximum profit .

feature-4.title: Direct Products Sell To Customer
feature-4.description: Sell products to customer directly without a middleman . Gain more profits .

feature-5.title: Weather Forecast
feature-5.description: Get wheather forecast at your sitting place . This will help you manage your crops efficently . Less losses more gains .
